Silent Shot Phantom [Greater Style]

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Rogue, Silent Shot Student feat
Benefit: When you are attacking with a shortbow or a crossbow and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.
Whenever you hit an enemy with a martial power, that enemy takes a -2 penalty to Perception checks until the end of your next turn.
When you attack with a power associated with this feat, you can use a free action before the attack to shift 2 squares and make a Stealth check to become hidden.


Associated Powers:
Blindside: (Only when used as a ranged attack)
Guerrilla Blitz: (Only when used as a ranged attack)
Perfect Strike: (Only when used as a ranged attack)Powerful Shot,
Rogue's Luck: (Only when used as a ranged attack)
Trickster's Blade: (Only when used as a ranged attack)

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 130.
